name: SHORT SLEEVE ONESIE in Moss - Flowers - Flower Child --
description:
Makrista Baby's lap shoulder onesie's are 100% European combed cotton. Our clothing is soft, soft, soft....

Makrista Baby garments are finished with double stitching and an overlock stitch.

Our colors are hand mixed custom colors and our garments are hand dyed creating very deep rich colors.

The patches that are applied to our garments have hand drawn images that are transferred onto funky distressed patches then applied to our hand dyed garments. All our images are inspired and drawn by in house artisans of Makrista Baby . Each garment has text written on the back between the shoulders. The text is on the same funky distressed patch...

Our sizes range from 0-3,3-6,6-12,12-18,18-24,24-36 months please let us know what size at check out.

name: LONG SLEEVE BOOTY 2 PIECE SET - in Cranberry - Giraffe - Being Tall is Overrated --
description:
Makrista Baby's Long Sleeve Bootie set are 100% combed cotton. Our clothing is soft, soft, soft....

Our colors are hand mixed custom colors and our garments are hand dyed creating very deep rich colors.

The patches that are applied to our garments have hand drawn images that are transferred onto funky distressed patches then applied to our hand dyed garments.

All our images are inspired and drawn by in house artisans of Makrista Baby . Each garment has text written on the back between the shoulders. The text (BEING TALL IS OVERRATED) is on the same funky distressed patch...

These 2 Piece Booty sets come in 0-3 and 3-6 months...please note what size you need at checkout!

name: VINTAGE CAMERA HONOR YOUR VISION -ADULT Distressed T-Shirt Size Small Medium or Large - --
description:
These distressed T-Shirts are 100% light-weight, super soft cotton made in the USA. They have been created with a distressed (grinding) neck-line and hems giving each shirt the look of your favorite well-worn and much loved T.

The image applied to the front of the shirt is a VINTAGE CAMERA with the words "HONOR YOUR VISION" on the back.
